meanings.definition: The quality or state of being sublime.
meanings.sent1: The sublimenesses of the mountain peak took my breath away.
meanings.sent2: The sublimenesses of the sunset filled me with awe.
meanings.sent3: The sublimenesses of the cake made it disappear in seconds.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness had a sublimenesses that touched everyone around her.
meanings.sent5: The sublimenesses of the orchestra's performance lingered in the air.

meanings.definition: The sublime or grand nature of something.
meanings.sent1: We marveled at the sublimenesses of the ancient castle.
meanings.sent2: The sublimenesses of the waterfall left us speechless.
meanings.sent3: The sublimenesses of the joke had us all laughing uncontrollably.
meanings.sent4: The sublimenesses of the starry night sky was like a blanket of wonder.
meanings.sent5: His speech was filled with the sublimenesses of hope and inspiration.
